1.title: Basically, He Was Framed

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The Harris family returns as an even bigger brood as Tip and Tameka's baby girl, Heiress Diana, is introduced. However, the biggest news is the separation of Tip and Tameka.

2.title: Working Girl

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Now that she has separated from T.I., Tiny is ready to show that you can be a mother and a strong businesswoman at the same time. Meanwhile, Major is no longer the baby in the family and is growing up too fast.

3.title: Mug Shot

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: With her new album about to be released, Niq Niq considers whether she should use her mug shot for merchandizing. Meanwhile, T.I. is looking to start over, beginning with his house, but worries as each item exceeds the budget.

4.title: Xscape is in the building

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Tameka's girl group Xscape sets out to go on tour but when Tameka tells T.I. her plans to take Heiress on the road, he becomes uncomfortable. Meanwhile, Domani's grades are suffering soTip takes the one thing that means most.

5.title: Domani's Platform

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: When Domani seems indifferent after being racially profiled, T.I. helps his son realize that this action is not acceptable. Meanwhile, fearing that Tiny is lonely, Niq Niq struggles with finding alone time with her boyfriend.

6.title: Look at the Car, Bro

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: After Messiah crashes T.I.'s expensive sports car, T.I. revokes Messiah's driving privileges. Tiny has a new business venture as the owner of a co-ed basketball team.

7.title: What I Should Have Said Was...

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Tip is in hot water after a radio interview where he called Tameka a distraction. Tip takes it upon himself to reach out to people he's closest with so he can clear the air.

8.title: Episode #6.8

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: T.I and Tiny put on a brave face for their family and throw Heiress a fun-filled christening. The time has come for a decision to be made about their marriage.

1.title: God, Family, Hustle

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Grammy award-winning rapper T.I. "Tip" Harris has been in prison for the past 11 months. Just as things are starting to look up, his wife Tameka receives a devastating phone call delaying their reunion.

2.title: Booty Tag

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: T.I. is finally back with his family, but settling in at home isn't easy. With his first performance days away his family and professional life are clashing!

3.title: America's Sweetheart

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Pop music superstar Taylor Swift invites T.I. to perform at her concert in Atlanta. T.I. struggles with the idea that performing with America's sweetheart might ruin his hard core image.

4.title: Stacks on Deck

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Tip's son Domani hopes to follow in his dad's footsteps and become a famous rapper. Will his first performance in front of thousands of fans scare him back to reality? Meanwhile Tiny continues to make progress toward owning her own nail salon, but her best friend Shakinah has a few ideas of her own. Can Tiny reject her friend's crazy ideas and still keep their relationship in tact?

5.title: I Will Put My Foot on Your Back Pocket

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Tiny and T.I. are back in Los Angeles after their last disastrous trip to the city. Tip's there for work but Tiny and friends are there for play. The girls make a trip to the plastic surgeon but the visit is not exactly what one friend was expecting. A phone call from home puts Tip on the defense as he heads back to Atlanta early.

6.title: Bad and Sneaky

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Tip's head explodes when he finds out his youngest daughter Deyjah has a boyfriend.

7.title: King of the House

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: T.I. and Tiny's son King has been staying with his grandmother and she's been spoiling him rotten. But when it's time to come home,T.I. and Tiny are faced with trying to discipline their wild child.

8.title: Tip Clause

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: With Christmas around the corner, Tip decides to teach the children a valuable lesson in charity.

9.title: Baby Fever

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: With the kids growing up, Tameka is thinking of having another baby. But when Tameka begins sharing her news, the family surprises her with their reaction.

10.title: Green Faces

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Domani has lost focus in school because he wants to follow in his father's footsteps as a performer. In order to show Domani the value of good grades, Tip promises him his own music video if his grades improve.

11.title: Baby Girl

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: When Tip's overprotective nature starts interfering with Niq Niq's work with the OMG Girlz, Tiny must give Tip a reality check.

12.title: Sixty Forty

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Tip heads into the studio to collaborate with Usher on a new record while Tiny agrees to go into business with Shekinah.

13.title: Can You Work?

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: With the OMG Girlz already in Los Angeles to sign a recording deal, Tiny convinces Tip to take King and Major along to try their hands at acting.

14.title: All for One

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Tip is in the final hectic days leading up to the fashion show for his clothing line, AKOO, and realizes he can't do it without the help of his family.

1.title: Family Camping

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: TI and Tiny are back! This family is no stranger to life's greatest adventures, they've survived it all. But can the Harris family overcome their hardest challenge to date?

2.title: Birthday Bash

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: What do Usher, Nelly, Kelly Rowland, and Lil' Wayne all have in common? They're all performing at this Summer's hottest hip hop concert, and for the first time since his prison release, TI is headlining.

3.title: Harris Proof

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Tameka's talk show was picked up and the ladies are getting ready for production but Tameka's best friend Shekinah is feeling out of the loop and believes she can add a perspective the other women can't.

4.title: Bitter Sweet

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: T.I. and Tiny's oldest daughter Niq Niq is turning 16 and T.I. wants to throw her the party of the year. But when it comes time for Niq Niq to get her dream car, Tip has other plans.

5.title: Windy City Hustle

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: T.I., Tiny, and Shekinah are Chicago bound. While T.I. promotes his upcoming album, Shekinah drags Tiny all through the windy city looking for her idol, Oprah.

6.title: Who's the Boss

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: After attending their first NASCAR event, Tip and Tameka argue over who's the better driver. With each of their personal cars on the line, the whole family joins in on the competition.

7.title: Harris Family Fitness Challenge

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: After catching his family eating junk food, Tip decides it's time for them to get in shape! With money on the line, Tameka, Shekinah and the kids are put to the test, but Shekinah's desire to win leads her to do the unthinkable.

8.title: Bucket List

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Wanting to grab life by the horns, Tameka and Shekinah set out to cross life-long dreams off their bucket list, until they come across an unpredictable creature that makes them think twice.

9.title: Family Pet

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: After King's pet hamster passes away, the kids beg their dad for a dog. But Tip is unwilling to bring another animal into the home. When Tameka makes an interesting offer on behalf of the children, Tip puts the kids through a test.

10.title: Plastic Surgery

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Finally fed up with being overweight and out of shape, Shekinah goes under the knife. Meanwhile, Tip wants to take the family to New Orleans to shoot a music video for his newest single with Lil' Wayne.

11.title: Lemonade Stand

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Tameka takes her mom Diane to see the OMG Girlz perform on their latest tour and the girls have a surprise that will bring Diane to tears. Trying to teach the kids business skills, Tip and Nelly help them come up with a plan.

12.title: Bust a Move

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: It's the battle of generations as Tameka and Niq Niq face off in a competition to see who's the better dancer. Tameka turns to an unlikely source to get the edge but will it be enough?

13.title: Major's Precious

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: As Major's first day of pre-school approaches, Auntie Precious feels like it's time to move on but Tameka isn't quite ready to let her leave the Harris home and devises a plan to keep her around.

14.title: Etiquette Coach

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: After Shekinah acts unprofessional during the taping of Tameka's talk show pilot and photo shoot, Tameka worries Shekinah's attitude could jeopardize her hustle.

15.title: City Cowboy

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Domani is hired for his first paid gig but when he tells Tip he's intimidated by him, Tip has to make a decision about whether or not to go to Domani's performance.

16.title: It Takes Two to Hustle

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: With Tip's probation coming to a close, it's time to go full hustle on promoting his new album and go all out with a big celebration bash.

17.title: A Very Harris Christmas

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: With Christmas around the corner, the kids are making their lists and checking them twice. But as the Christmas list grows, T.I.Â¹s concerned the kids donÂ¹t know how much work goes into paying for their gifts.

1.title: Snow Hustle

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: T.I. decides to pack up and take the family on a winter adventure. New to the ski slopes anything could happen with this family as they try to tackle the mountains of Big Bear, California.

2.title: A Major Move

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Domani thinks he's ready for a record deal, but Tip doesn't believe in handing it to him until he has earned it. Will Domani be able to prove himself on the mic, without all of his expensive recording tools? Or, will he find out he doesn't have the Hip Hop chops? Back at home, Tameka discovers Major has a paralyzing phobia of water, and immediately enrolls him in swimming lessons to help him conquer his fear.

3.title: King Chaos

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: When Shekinah tells Tameka raising kids isn't hard, Tameka challenges her to take care of the Harris children for a day. Meanwhile, Tip and Tameka use the opportunity to step out and have fun.

4.title: The Love Letter

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: With Spring Break around the corner, Tameka convinces Tip to take the family to the West Coast for a beach vacation. Meanwhile, a controversial love letter is found in King's backpack causing the entire family to weigh in.

5.title: Hair Therapy

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Shekinah is trying to move up in the hair industry, and hopes a booth at the world famous Bronner Bros. hair show will help take her there. Will Shekinah be able to keep it classy without the support of her best friend?

6.title: Play Date

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Shekinah is fed up with both living and working in the same house, and with Tameka's help wants to search for a new home. Meanwhile, when Tip sees Major spending more time with his video games than his friends, Tip decides to set up a play date.

7.title: Hello

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: When Major asks Tip to be in his new music video for his single "Hello" with CeeLo Green, Tip decides to incorporate the entire family. Will the kids be up to the challenge of a full day of shooting, or will the hot desert of Vegas wear them down?

9.title: Becoming a Man

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: With Messiah turning thirteen and entering into young adulthood, Tip encourages Messiah to go on his very first date. But in typical Harris family fashion, going solo is a no-no, so the whole family comes along for the ride.

10.title: Magnum, T.I.

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: When Tip finds an incriminating text on Niq Niq's phone, he sets out with Major to get to the bottom of things. Later, Tameka encourages Shekinah to join an improv group and sends the funniest person she knows to join her, King.

12.title: Boot Camp

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: When Shekinah moves into her new home, Tameka convinces her she needs home owner's boot camp. Back at the house, Tip is discouraged by his kids' lack of basketball skills, and sets up a game with NBA star Josh Smith.

13.title: White for a Day

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Fed up with Shekinah always saying she wants to be white, Tameka suggests they spend the day doing things white people do. But will Shekinah see that the grass isn't always greener?

14.title: Ringmasters

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: King, Major, and Precious are hired for their first paid gig at the circus. Under pressure, will the kids step up to the challenge and put on a great performance?

15.title: The Workout Video

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Tameka and Shekinah decide to make a unique workout video for people who don't like to work out. But with both women having different ideas, can they get it together in time? Meanwhile, Tip takes the boys to LA for some business and pleasure.

16.title: Education First

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: When Domani and King come home with less than stellar report cards, Tip takes matters into his own hands and hires them a tutor. Meanwhile, Tameka prepares her new girl group French Kiss for their first paid gig.

18.title: Family Fun Time

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: In the third season finale, Tip decides to take the family to Puerto Rico for a much needed getaway. Meanwhile, Tameka meets up with Niq Niq and the OMG Girlz as they embark on their newest tour.

1.title: Inquiring Intel

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In the fourth season opener Tip decides to spend more quality time with his daughters. In an attempt to find out more information about their lives he participates in something he wouldn't normally do. But as the girls start to dish the details, is Tip ready to hear what they have to say?

2.title: Call 911

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: After Messiah and Domani rescue Precious from an asthma attack, Tip takes it upon himself to make sure the kids have proper training for any emergency situation.

3.title: Gravi-TI

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: In an effort to teach their family about teamwork, Tip and Tameka take the kids to Space Camp where they will have to complete challenges in order to graduate. But when the kids have a difficult time working together, their mission becomes jeopardized.

4.title: The Contract

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When Tameka finally convinces Tip to get the kids something they've wanted for years, the kids are ecstatic. But before it becomes official the kids are put to the test to see if they are responsible enough for something this big.

5.title: Kindred Spirits

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: When Russell Simmons stops by the Harris home he and Domani hit it off but when asked to make a song for Russell's new video game will Domani meet his high expectations? Meanwhile, with Niq Niq getting ready to leave the nest Tameka is having a hard time letting go and arranges a day for her and their friends to spend together to give them life advice.

6.title: The Rainmaker

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Inspired by Niq Niq's graduation and to set an example for her children, Tameka is motivated to hit the books and get her GED. Meanwhile, with his teenage son's racking up the phone bill Tip takes his oldest boys to a place where they can earn money, the hard way.

7.title: The Assistant

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: As Shekinah's lifestyle picks up speed, she seeks help from Tameka to try and find an assistant who can handle her growing work load and personal life. But can she find the person with the right balance of what she's looking for? With Domani spending more time in the recording studio, Tip wants him to experience the full studio life, including pranks.

8.title: Make a Wish

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: When King and Major rattle off a list of what they want to be when they grow up, including imaginary professions, Tameka decides to expose the boys to alternative options to expand their horizons. Meanwhile, Tip makes a Make-A-Wish recipient's dream come true by giving him a night he'll never forget.

9.title: Field Trip

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: When Tip chaperones Major's field trip to the fire station he takes it to another level with a surprise the kids will never forget. Meanwhile Tameka's on a mission to get her mom out of the house after her dad's recent passing, but is her mom ready for what she has planned?

10.title: Major's First Dance

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: It's Major's first dance and the whole family must get him prepared for the special night. But first he has to overcome his fears and ask a girl out on a date, learn to dance, get a suit, and get a corsage. Will Major's nerves get the best of him when the big moment comes?

11.title: Harris Family Lemonade

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: The Harris family is embarking on a new business venture together - lemonade! The kids decide they want to start a lemonade business and Tip and Tameka are there to help them every step of the way. After diving the kids into groups, each team comes up with a name and unique flavor for their lemonade. But the true test comes when they go to a focus group to see if the public likes their product, and what they discover there gives Tip an idea.

12.title: Get EDGE-ucated

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Shekinah has a new hair product for sale and she wants to promote it by enlisting Tameka's help in producing an infomercial. However, when Shekinah fails to learn her lines she takes her frustration out on Tameka. Can the girls pull it together or will it end in disaster? Meanwhile, Tip takes his sons to a very special event, but there's a price the kids will have to pay when it's over.

13.title: Hypnotist

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Shekinah's chain smoking is driving Tameka crazy so she decides that her friend needs professional help...from a hypnotist. Shekinah's skeptical until she sees a hypnotized Tameka do things she never would do on her own, but will hypnotism help her quit the nasty habit for good? Meanwhile, Tip's kids are bored so he decides to take them to his old neighborhood where he shocks them with a very interesting hometown game.

14.title: Athletic-Off

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Tameka and Shekinah decide to compete in a series of athletic events to determine who's the better athlete. The stakes are high, as the loser will have to deal with whatever King decides is their punishment. The competition is fierce, but things turn scary when one of the girls falls ill during the final challenge. Meanwhile, Tip takes Domani and Messiah to a real science lab to learn about some cool experiments.

15.title: Country Day

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Tameka and Shekinah decide to go out to the country for some fun, but when mudding turns out to be way more than she can handle Tameka quickly learns the reality of country living is tougher than it looks. Can this city girl survive the day or will the country win out? Back at home, Messiah has gotten himself into a sticky situation and asks Tip for help. Will Tip be able to fix things or will his meddling just make things worse?

16.title: Home Alone

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Tip arrives home to find Precious out of sorts. The boys have been running rampant in the house and Precious just can't take it anymore. Tip decides it's time once again for T.I. P.I. to do an all-out investigation into her claims. Meanwhile, Tiny decides she needs to get Niq Niq and the OMG Girls into a Self Defense class. Will Niq Niq take the instructor seriously, or will Tiny have to step in and take over?

17.title: Prank Wars

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: Tip decides to teach Major the art of Pranking. After pranking Domani and Messiah, Tip realizes he may have created a monster. Meanwhile, Niq Niq and Deyjah convince Tameka to take them out for a day of adventure. Tameka agrees, but reveals she has ulterior motives. Will the girls make it through Adventure Day with their relationships in tact?

18.title: Chef TI

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: Tameka asks Major to take her out on a pretend date, so King can teach Major the rules of being a gentleman. But, when they get to the arcade, Major reveals that he has other plans. Meanwhile, Tip is convinced he should have his own cooking show, and takes it to Los Angeles to get the ball rolling. Will LA roll out the red carpet for "Chef Tip," or will he return home empty-handed?

19.title: Omani the Comedian

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: After a string of painfully punny jokes, Tip decides Domani needs lessons in the art of comedy from one of his famous friends. After a little practice, will Domani be able to hold the attention of the audience when he performs at a real comedy club? Or, will he be laughed off stage? Meanwhile, Tameka holds the Mother-Daughter pageant of her dreams. But, Shekinah's behavior could send the entire event into chaos.

20.title: Major Learns to Swim

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Domani thinks he's ready for a record deal, but Tip doesn't believe in handing it to him until he has earned it. Will Domani be able to prove himself on the mic, without all of his expensive recording tools? Or, will he find out he doesn't have the Hip Hop chops? Back at home, Tameka discovers Major has a paralyzing phobia of water, and immediately enrolls him in swimming lessons to help him conquer his fear.

21.title: Harris Family Carnival

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: The Harris family wants to raise money for a charity close to their heart and in typical Harris fashion they go all out, and put on a carnival. While Tameka is in charge of setting up the games, Tip brings Domani to a magic shop to hone in his skills. But will it be enough to perform at the charity event?

22.title: Harris Thanksgiving

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: It's Thanksgiving and in the spirit of giving back, the Harris family is making and handing out food to a local shelter. However, when the kids get rowdy, Tip steps in to make sure they stay on task.

1.title: Costa Rica

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: After five years of marriage, T.I. and Tiny decide to celebrate with a trip to Costa Rica. However, when the family catches wind of this planned getaway, T.I. and Tiny feel the pressure to make it a family vacation.

2.title: Moving Out

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: At 19 years old, Tiny's firstborn child, Niq Niq has decided she's ready to move out! Tiny isn't convinced Niq Niq is ready to move out on her own just yet. The two women set out to discover whether this teen is prepared for this next phase of her life. Meanwhile, Messiah seeks permission from T.I. to obtain a Driver's permit, but T.I. has some of his own unorthodox tests for Messiah to pass first.

3.title: Mr. Fixer Upper

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A longtime friend of the family, Crow, seeks T.I.'s expert advice and guidance in obtaining some female companionship. T.I., who willingly accepts the task, learns that with ol' Crow, it'll take more than a makeover to help his needs. Meanwhile, Tiny finds herself in a game of seek and find once she discovers Niq Niq hasn't been completely honest about where she is and what she's doing.

4.title: Are You Smarter?

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: While hanging out with his friend K-Dub, T.I. notes that Major might be smarter than his friend...and most adults. With a thousand dollars on the line, T.I. and K-Dub test Major's knowledge against the people of Atlanta. Tiny and Niq Niq are on a health kick and a recently single Precious is determined to join them in attempts to get herself a man. Doubtful of her commitment to keep up with them, the girls test Precious' ability to adhere to a strict and healthy lifestyle.

5.title: A Major Manager

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Hit with the acting bug, Major wants to take it to the next level, but struggles with the required focus it takes. When King steps in to "manage" Major, he takes it too far forcing Tameka to intervene. When Tip notices some of his older children having trouble giving a helping hand to one another, he takes them to a place where they are locked in a room and the only one way out is to work together.

6.title: Pesky House Guest

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: T.I.'s friend K-Dub is in need of a place to stay and what better place than with a friend who has plenty of room! However, after a few short days, K-Dub overstays his welcome with the family and T.I. must figure out a way to remain a gracious host, yet get K-Dub to leave on his own. Meanwhile, King is inspired to set a world record and goes on a search to find the one thing he can do that no one else can.

7.title: Superhero

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Tip is excited about his role in the new Superhero movie Ant Man. Unfortunately, King and Major aren't. After a few failed attempts, Tip takes extreme measures to try and inspire these boys to find their hero within. Meanwhile, a proactive Tameka hatches a plan to nix any baby fever Niq Niq might have now that she's spending time with her boyfriend. But when Tameka sees how well Niq Niq is handling her test, she worries her plan will backfire.

8.title: Stakeout

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: With Niq Niq living on her own, Tip and Tameka make a surprise visit to her apartment. But when Tip notices articles of clothing belonging to a man, he suspects she's having her boyfriend sleep over, which is against their rules. Tip enlists the help from his junior sleuth, Major, to find out more. Meanwhile, the girls of the house are tired of the boys being gross and disgusting and try to give them a taste of their own medicine.

9.title: Precious Date

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Tiny is once again determined to find Precious a new man, this time persuading her to try online dating. Although weary of being catfished, Precious goes along with it, allowing Niq Niq and her own daughter Kamaya to create and manage the online profile. Collectively they decide on a suitor but aren't sure the mystery man will live up to his profile descriptions. Meanwhile, Tip and Major have decided playing sick is the best way to find uninterrupted peace and quiet.

10.title: Restaurant

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: With the opening of Tip's new restaurant, the kids want in on the action. Worried they'll interfere with his business but wanting to allow them the experience of restaurant life, Tip gives the kids a crash course, but when put to the test with real customers will they live up to the test? Niq Niq is branching away from the OMG Girls and going solo.

11.title: Harris Haunted House

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: In this spooky mid-season finale, T.I., Tiny, and the family set out to determine whether or not ghosts are real, by investigating a house known to be haunted. Will the brood find what they're looking for, or will the noises behind the walls be too much for the Harris Family?

12.title: All About Domani

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Once again, Domani attempts to showcase his ever growing talent as an all-around entertainer, this time as a talk show host and producer. With the help of Tiny and a few of his siblings, can he prove to T.I. that he does in fact have the creative chops to succeed?

14.title: A Major Baptism

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: King and Zonnique express a desire to be baptized, to which their mother Tiny is supportive. However, the idea of Major joining in on the experience quickly comes to a halt when he once again reveals a phobia to water, leaving Tiny with the challenge of helping her youngest son overcome his fear. Meanwhile Tip has a challenge of his own, as he is tasked with preparing his old, family-friend Crow for an epic first date.

17.title: Where's Major?

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: With the recent passing of her nephew, Tiny, her mom, and Zonnique meet with a medium in hopes of gaining closure. However, when the ladies start discussing their private lives, the medium reveals more than Niq Niq would like to admit. Meanwhile, with his oldest boys not paying attention, especially when it comes to watching his youngest, Major, T.I devises a plan that will hopefully scare the boys straight.

20.title: Blackmail

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: While visiting the house, T.I.'s comedian sidekick, K-Dubb exploits an opportunity to trade his silence about a broken vase for miscellaneous favors. Tiny and her longtime friend, Toya are challenged to a lip-sync battle by their adolescent daughters.

-1.title: Episode dated 16 August 2016

episode of.title: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle (TV Series 2011– )
